body_html:
They updated the default one today to 0.2.0_0 (Using torch.__version__ as I wrote above) as an answer to the issue I opened.
On other computer I used soumith channel I got the exact same version.

The Release page of GitHub talks about version 0.2.0 as well.
body_text:
They updated the default one today to 0.2.0_0 (Using torch.__version__ as I wrote above) as an answer to the issue I opened.
On other computer I used soumith channel I got the exact same version.
The Release page of GitHub talks about version 0.2.0 as well.
body:
They updated the default one today to 0.2.0_0 (Using `torch.__version__` as I wrote above) as an answer to the issue I opened.
On other computer I used `soumith` channel I got the exact same version.

The [Release page of GitHub talks about version 0.2.0](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/releases/tag/v0.2.0) as well.
